name: Scarab (Erick Soltero, Ziro Dev, xue the sun, Snakenatt, Camileytor2008, Mateo Gonzalez, Gabriel G. Mora, Daniel Valencia Alvarez)
name_original: Scarab (Erick Soltero, Ziro Dev, xue the sun, Snakenatt, Camileytor2008, Mateo Gonzalez, Gabriel G. Mora, Daniel Valencia Alvarez)
description:
A platform game about life and death.

This game was made during Global Game Jam 2022. It was a great experience developing this game as a team of 10.

W/A/S/D: Move

Double A/D:  Dash

Space: Jump

F: Attack/Interact

<3 Thank you to all the wonderful members of my team <3
